reasoning: DLBCL is the most common non-Hodgkin lymphoma subtype. Incidence ~6-8 per 100k globally from GLOBOCAN 2005 and lymphoma registries. Age-related incidence increases significantly after age 60. Well-documented in cancer registries with good data quality.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC); WHO classification of hematologic malignancies
